marilib.aircraft_model.operations.handling_qualities module¶

Created on Thu Jan 24 23:22:21 2019

@author: DRUOT Thierryoriginal Scilab implementation

PETEILH Nicolas : portage to Python

marilib.aircraft_model.operations.handling_qualities.backward_cg_stab(aircraft, stability_margin)[source]¶

Computes max backward CG position according to static stability (neutral point position)

marilib.aircraft_model.operations.handling_qualities.forward_cg_stall(aircraft, altp, disa, nei, hld_conf, speed_mode, mass)[source]¶

Computes max forward trimmable CG position at stall speed

marilib.aircraft_model.operations.handling_qualities.thrust_yaw_moment(aircraft, fn, pamb, mach, dcx_oei)[source]¶

Assumed right engine inoperative

marilib.aircraft_model.operations.handling_qualities.vertical_tail_sizing(aircraft)[source]¶

Computes necessary VTP area variation to meet engine failure case constraint Influence of CG position is ignored
